Producer: Anurag Kashyap, Vikramaditya Motwane, Madhu Mantena Varma, Karan Johar
Production Co: Fox Star Studios, Dharma Productions, Film Poland Productions, Phantom Films
Synopsis: Jagjinder Joginder, a wedding planner, brings together the dysfunctional family of businessman Bipin Arora while making arrangements for Bipin's daughter's destination wedding in London.
Title: Magnificent
